reviewText: Bought this for my 2 yr old grandson who is obsessed with fire engines.  This was a favorite of my grown son at this age and I was happy to find it.  It's timeless and I'm surprised it is not available in a dvd.  Grandson loves it too!
Loved this movie short as a child and bought it to teach fire safety to my K-4 daycare program.  Still an awesome story
